sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves core data for employees from Cornerstone.

Inputs:

  • ID - Cornerstone generated unique ID.
  • User ID - Unique identifier of the user.
  • First Name - First name of the employee.
  • Last Name - Last name of the employee.
  • GUID - GUID of the employee.
  • Last Modified Date - Last modified date in UTC DateTime (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-M-D, YYYY/MM/DD, or YYYY/M/D) format. This returns any employee records that were modified since the date provided in this field (inclusive).
  • Created Date - Date when the employee record was created in UTC DateTime (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-M-D, YYYY/MM/DD, or YYYY/M/D) format.
  • Page Number - Page number of the result set. Default value is 1.
  • Page Size - Number of records in a result set. Default and maximum value is 50.
  • Include Inactive - Specifies if the inactive records is to be included in the response. Valid values are Yes, No, True, or False. By default, only active employees are included in the response.

Outputs:

  • Employees - List of employee details.
    • ID
    • User ID
    • User Name
    • Fax
  • Reason For Change
  • Size - Payload size.
  • Start - Start value for payload.
  • Total Records - Total number of records from this API call.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Cornerstone, Status is set to “Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Provided ID is invalid.
  • No employee details are available for the provided input.
  • Provided Created Date is not in a valid format MM/DD/YYYY, M/D/YYYY / MM-DD-YYYY, or M-D-YYYY, or is invalid.
  • Provided Last Modified Date is not in a valid format MM/DD/YYYY, M/D/YYYY / MM-DD-YYYY, or M-D-YYYY, or is invalid.
  • Provided GUID is invalid.
  • Provided Page Size is invalid or exceeds the max page size value.
  • Provided Page Number is invalid.
  • Provided value for Include Inactive field is invalid.
  • Invalid username, password, or token, or expired token.
  • User doesn’t have sufficient permission to perform this action.
  • Unexpected error occurred. Check the response received from the API for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding Cornerstone connection and credential must be created and associated with the Cornerstone Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Demo Action 2

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves core data for employees from Cornerstone.

Inputs:

  • ID - Cornerstone generated unique ID.
  • User ID - Unique identifier of the user.
  • First Name - First name of the employee.
  • Last Name - Last name of the employee.
  • GUID - GUID of the employee.
  • Last Modified Date - Last modified date in UTC DateTime (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-M-D, YYYY/MM/DD, or YYYY/M/D) format. This returns any employee records that were modified since the date provided in this field (inclusive).
  • Created Date - Date when the employee record was created in UTC DateTime (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-M-D, YYYY/MM/DD, or YYYY/M/D) format.
  • Page Number - Page number of the result set. Default value is 1.
  • Page Size - Number of records in a result set. Default and maximum value is 50.
  • Include Inactive - Specifies if the inactive records is to be included in the response. Valid values are Yes, No, True, or False. By default, only active employees are included in the response.

Outputs:

  • Employees
    • ID
    • User ID
    • User Name
    • GUID
    • First Name
    • Last Name
    • Middle Name
    • Prefix
    • Suffix
    • Primary Email
    • Personal Email
    • Home Phone
    • Mobile Phone
    • Work Phone
    • Fax
    • Address
      • Country
      • Line1
      • Line2
      • City
      • State
      • Zip Code
    • Worker Status
      • Last Hire Date
      • Original Hire Date
      • Active
      • Absent
    • Settings
      • Display Language
      • Time Zone
      • Training Approvals
    • Manager
      • ID
      • User ID
      • First Name
      • Last Name
    • Approver
      • ID
      • User ID
      • First Name
      • Last Name
    • Relations
      • Relation Type
      • ID
      • User ID
      • First Name
      • Last Name
    • OUs
      • ID
      • OU ID
      • Name
      • Type
    • Self-Registration Group
      • ID
      • OU ID
      • Name
      • Type
    • Custom OUs
      • ID
      • OU ID
      • Name
      • Type
    • Custom Fields
      • ID
      • Name
      • Value
    • Employee Meta Data
      • Created Date
      • Modified Date
    • Reason For Change
  • Size - Payload size.
  • Start - Start value for payload.
  • Total Records - Total number of records from this API call.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Cornerstone, Status is set to “Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Provided ID is invalid.
  • No employee details are available for the provided input.
  • Provided Created Date is not in a valid format MM/DD/YYYY, M/D/YYYY / MM-DD-YYYY, or M-D-YYYY, or is invalid.
  • Provided Last Modified Date is not in a valid format MM/DD/YYYY, M/D/YYYY / MM-DD-YYYY, or M-D-YYYY, or is invalid.
  • Provided GUID is invalid.
  • Provided Page Size is invalid or exceeds the max page size value.
  • Provided Page Number is invalid.
  • Provided value for Include Inactive field is invalid.
  • Invalid username, password, or token, or expired token.
  • User doesn’t have sufficient permission to perform this action.
  • Unexpected error occurred. Check the response received from the API for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding Cornerstone connection and credential must be created and associated with the Cornerstone Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
